articles.author: Lateshia Beachum, Jasmine Hilton, Katie Shepherd
articles.title: Maryland couple prepared for Hajj pilgrimage, then died in extreme heat - The Washington Post
articles.description: A Prince George’s County couple known for the activism for the African diaspora were among the 1,300 who died this month during the Hajj pilgrimage to Mecca, Saudi Arabia.
articles.content:
For weeks, Alhaji Alieu Dausy Wurie and his wife, Haja Isatu Wurie, prepared for the Hajj, a pilgrimage to Mecca, Saudi Arabia, the holiest city for Muslims.
The couple walked two to three miles a d… [+8005 chars]
